body:
Comment 3: 
To be 100% certain I need to see the code invoking the printer, but (by current design),
if the printer is invoked with a node that is not a file node (e.g. just a statement),
it won't have comments not associated with declarations (albeit from judging off the
above examples, the printer gets a file node). Only for File nodes, all comments are
present in the AST, assuming the parser was instructed to collect them (via the
parser.ParseComments flag), and they were not discarded along the way somehow.
